descriptions: Received in-depth hands-on training in the latest technologies taught by industry-experienced professors, helping to be a proficient Full Stack Developer.

Involved analyzing and clarifying new requirements, features with Business Analyst and Developer Team on Security DVRs system which comes with features like motion detection, remote viewing and long-term storage of footage.
Developed and documented Test Designs, Test Plans, Test Cases for each functionality.
Performed functional and integration testing to validate and ensure the DVR and its integrated software work according to the requirements and specifications seamlessly.
Performed performance testing under various conditions, particularly when dealing with large data volumes or multiple camera feeds.
Analyzed test results and provided feedback to improve product quality.

address: Thich Quang Duc, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
descriptions: Helped students build a strong foundation in mathematical concepts, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills.
Created engaging lesson plans, assessed student progress, and adapted instruction to meet diverse learning needs.
